mapper.update:
update t_article
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subTitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
videoUrl = #{videourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clickCount = #{clickcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subTitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, videoUrl = #{videourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clickCount = #{clickcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
